about.title: AKINRINOA SAMSON OREOFE
about.subtitle: motiVOItion CEO
about.description:
Akinrinola Samson Ore-Ofe is a creative professional and project manager based in Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire. He is a 35 year old Nigerian national with a wide range of technical and creative skills developed over more than fifteen years of professional experience.

Samson possesses high proficiency in several technical areas:

Design and Graphics: He is skilled in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and XD for UX/UI design. He also has experience with LaserGRBL for laser cutting and engraving.

Video and Audio: He is an expert in video editing using tools like DaVinci Resolve, Capcut, and Filmora. His audio skills include sound arrangement and editing with iZotope RX and Adobe Audition.

Business and Management: He has strong capabilities in strategic planning, market research, budgeting, and business development.

Samson is multilingual, speaking Yorùbá and English fluently, with intermediate skills in French. He describes himself as a loyal, creative, and collaborative professional who is dedicated to constant learning and helping others through teaching and training. In his free time, he enjoys music, cinema, sports, and tourism.
